name: Vitamin - Android UI kit
description:
This is the kit for creating Decathlon experiences on Android. This includes layouts, radius, shadows, typographies and all components you need to design mobile experiences. 

 

Full documentation: Decathlon.design

Github repo: 

Github.com/Decathlon/vitamin-android

Github.com/Decathlon/vitamin-compose


Suggestion and/or feedback are welcome. Feel free to contact us thanks to this feedback form.
